TeamOverviewPage.title: Your Teams
TeamOverviewPage.description: Manage your teams and create new ones
TeamOverviewPage.noTeams: You have no teams yet. Create one to get started!
TeamOverviewPage.emptyStateDescription: You haven't created any teams yet. Create one to get started.

createTeamDialog.title: Create a new Team
createTeamDialog.errorMessage: Error creating team, please try again.

TeamPage.title: Team Overview
TeamPage.description: See and edit your team's profile

overviewTab.title: Overview
overviewTab.daysSinceCreationDescription: Days since the team was created

teamTab.title: Add Members
teamTab.errorInvitingMember: Error inviting member, please try again.
teamTab.errorRemovingMember: Error removing member, please try again.
teamTab.minimumMembersRequired: Add at least 5 team members to start sending survey invitations.
teamTab.addMoreMembers: Add {count} more member{plural} to reach the minimum of 5 members before invitations are sent.
teamTab.minimumReached: Minimum team size reached. Invitations will be sent automatically.

resultsTab.title: Your Results
resultsTab.allMembersCompleted: All team members have completed the survey.
resultsTab.notAllMembersCompleted: Not all team members have completed the survey.
resultsTab.resultsNotReleased: Results have not yet been released by an administrator.

Errors.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this page

LoginPage.termsAndConditions: By clicking continue, you agree to our <tosLink>Terms of Service</tosLink> and <ppLink>Privacy Policy</ppLink>.
LoginPage.successMessage: Check your email for a login link!
LoginPage.errorMessage: An error while sending the login link. Please try again.

SurveyCard.title: Survey
SurveyCard.question: Which adjective would best describe your behavior?
SurveyCard.peerQuestion: Which adjective would best describes {name}'s behavior?
SurveyCard.submitError: Error submitting survey, please try again.

SurveyResult.title: Survey Result
SurveyResult.pleaseCompleteSurvey: Please complete the survey before viewing results.
SurveyResult.resultsNotReleased: Results have not yet been released by an administrator.

Admin.manageTeams: Manage all teams and their survey results
Admin.releaseTeamResultsDescription: Are you sure you want to release the results for team "{teamName}"? This action will make the survey results visible to all team members and cannot be undone.
Admin.createTeamDescription: Create a new team with an owner.
Admin.minimumMembersNote: At least 5 team members are required (in addition to the owner).
Admin.deleteTeamDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the team "{teamName}"? This action will permanently delete the team, all members, and all associated survey results. This action cannot be undone.
Admin.manageTags: Manage all tags used for team categorization
Admin.deleteTagDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the tag "{tagLabel}"? This will remove the tag from all teams that use it. This action cannot be undone.
Admin.createTagDescription: Create a new tag for team categorization.
Admin.noTagsAvailable: No tags available. Please create a tag first.

AdminUsers.manageUsers: Manage all users and their roles
AdminUsers.name: Name
AdminUsers.deleteUserDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the user "{userName}"? This action will permanently delete the user and remove them from all teams. This action cannot be undone.
AdminUsers.createAdminDescription: Create a new administrator user account.

LocaleSwitcher.label: Change Language
LocaleSwitcher.locale: {locale, select, de {Deutsch} en {English} fi {Finnisch} sn {Schwedisch} other {Unknown}}
